Vikua Idiomatic Chat

```{r}
library(shiny)
ui <- mod_chat_ui('chat')
server <- shinyServer(function(input, output, session) {
  mod_chat_server(
    'chat',
    user_id = 'user_id', 
    assistant_id = Sys.getenv('ASST_TAX_EXPERT'), 
    project = 'tributo-1', 
    dataset = 'prod_francisco_de_miranda'
  )
})
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
